abstract: Trump Golf Links at Ferry Point, luxury facility built on former landfill in the Bronx, opens following decades of false starts; course is first to be built in New York City since 1964 and will be by far the most expensive; is managed by the Trump Organization.
lead_paragraph: The course — built by New York City, designed in part by Jack Nicklaus and run by the Trump Organization — has greens fees about three times as high as the city’s other courses.

headline.main: Luxury Public Golf Course, Run by Trump, Opens on Former Bronx Dump
headline.print_headline: Luxury Public Golf Course, Run by Trump, Opens on Former Bronx Dump

snippet: The course — built by New York City, designed in part by Jack Nicklaus and run by the Trump Organization — has greens fees about three times as high as the city’s other courses.
